column4: I have a question here. I want to run a program as a normal user, but with high priority (with nice -n -19, say) but only root can do that. How can i do this?
if i use sudo nice -n -19 program, it will run as root
you should be able to start the process, the re-nice it as root - my understanding is that only root can nice a program up, ie, make it higher priority
that should read theN re-nice it as root
